spell.fallenwizardsmod.arcane_arrow.desc: Strike an enemy target with a strongly penetrating arcane arrow, dealing {damage} arcane spell damage
spell.fallenwizardsmod.arcane_arrow.name: Arcane Arrow
spell.fallenwizardsmod.arcane_barrage.de: Strike the area of choice with a barrage of arcane arrows, dealing {damage} arcane spell damage
spell.fallenwizardsmod.arcane_boom.descr: Strike the area before the caster, dealing {damage} arcane spell damage
spell.fallenwizardsmod.arcane_boom.name: Arcane Boom
spell.fallenwizardsmod.arcane_empowering: Apply Arcane Empowering status effect to you: stronger your arcane spell power, stronger the effect is applied
spell.fallenwizardsmod.fire_empowering.d: Apply Fire Empowering status effect to you: stronger your fire spell power, stronger the effect is applied
spell.fallenwizardsmod.fire_laser.descri: Channels a laser of pure fire, dealing {damage} fire spell damage every second and setting the target on fire
spell.fallenwizardsmod.fire_laser.name: Fire Laser
spell.fallenwizardsmod.firebolt.descript: Strike an enemy target, dealing {damage} fire spell damage and setting the target on fire
spell.fallenwizardsmod.firebolt.name: Firebolt
spell.fallenwizardsmod.frost_blizzard.de: Command the cold winds to blow away your enemies, dealing {damage} frost spell damage every second and slowing them down a lot
Apply Frost Empowering status effect to you: stronger your frost spell power, stronger the effect is applied
spell.fallenwizardsmod.frost_pillar.desc: Summon a Pillar of ice and snow, dealing {damage} frost spell damage every second and slowing them down a lot
spell.fallenwizardsmod.frost_pillar.name: Frost Pillar
spell.fallenwizardsmod.iceball.descripti: Strike an enemy target, dealing {damage} frost spell damage and slowing it down
spell.fallenwizardsmod.iceball.name: Ice Ball
spell.fallenwizardsmod.scorching_grounds: Set the ground on fire, dealing {damage} fire spell damage every second and setting the target on fire
